soundFile.title: Notification Sound
soundFile.description: The filepath to the sound that plays on chat message.

enabled.title: Enable Chat Notifications
enabled.description: Emits a notification sound every time a chat message is posted.

muteActive.title: Mute When Active
muteActive.description: Will mute notification sounds when chat tab is active.

muteRolls.title: Mute Rolls
muteRolls.description: Will mute notification sounds for roll messages.
